description: Ten`nyo was one of the eight celestial maidens who descended north of Biwa Lake to bathe in Lake Yogo in 723 AD. There http://anidb.net/ch102329 [Kirihata Taiyu] hid her raiment, preventing her from returning to heaven. Therefore, she eventually accepted her fate and agreed to marry Kirihata; a union which eventually resulted in a son and two daughters.
name: Ten`nyo
